scripts.deploy:blocksearch: aws --profile sjs --region us-east-1 --no-cli-pager lambda update-function-code --function-name arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:095629118679:function:searchpi-online-blocksearch --zip-file fileb://PiBots.zip --publish
scripts.deploy:filesearch: aws --profile sjs --region us-east-1 --no-cli-pager lambda update-function-code --function-name arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:095629118679:function:searchpi-online-filesearch --zip-file fileb://PiBots.zip --publish
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:blocksearch && npm run deploy:filesearch
